installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

echo -e "[SETUP] Install packages"
apt-get update -qq > /dev/null 2>&1 && apt-get install -qq -y git wget > /dev/null 2>&1

echo -e "[SETUP] Change directory to /mnt/server"
cd /mnt/server

echo -e "[SETUP] Create necessary folders"
mkdir -p /mnt/server/logs
mkdir -p /mnt/server/tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/www

echo -e "[SETUP] Cloning repository from GitHub"
git clone https://github.com/zarti0/apache-pterodactyl-tunnel.git ./gtemp > /dev/null 2>&1

echo -e "[SETUP] Copying files from the cloned repository"
cp -r ./gtemp/apache2 .
cp -r ./gtemp/php .
cp ./gtemp/apache2.sh .
cp ./gtemp/cloudflare.sh .
echo -e "[SETUP] Removing temporary folder"
rm -R ./gtemp

echo -e "[SETUP] Setting permissions for scripts"
chmod +x apache2.sh
chmod +x cloudflare.sh

OLD_VERSION="8.3"
echo -e "[SETUP] Replacing PHP version references"
mv /mnt/server/apache2/mods-available/php${OLD_VERSION}.conf /mnt/server/apache2/mods-available/php${PHP_VERSION}.conf
mv /mnt/server/apache2/mods-available/php${OLD_VERSION}.load /mnt/server/apache2/mods-available/php${PHP_VERSION}.load

sed -i "s|LoadModule php_module /usr/lib/apache2/modules/libphp${OLD_VERSION}.so|LoadModule php_module /usr/lib/apache2/modules/libphp${PHP_VERSION}.so|" /mnt/server/apache2/mods-available/php${PHP_VERSION}.load

mv /mnt/server/apache2/mods-enabled/php${OLD_VERSION}.conf /mnt/server/apache2/mods-enabled/php${PHP_VERSION}.conf
mv /mnt/server/apache2/mods-enabled/php${OLD_VERSION}.load /mnt/server/apache2/mods-enabled/php${PHP_VERSION}.load

sed -i "s|LoadModule php_module /usr/lib/apache2/modules/libphp${OLD_VERSION}.so|LoadModule php_module /usr/lib/apache2/modules/libphp${PHP_VERSION}.so|" /mnt/server/apache2/mods-enabled/php${PHP_VERSION}.load

echo -e "[SETUP] Updating Apache configuration with server port"
sed -i '8s/.*/	Listen '"${SERVER_PORT}"'/' /mnt/server/apache2/ports.conf
sed -i '12s/.*/	Listen '"${SERVER_PORT}"'/' /mnt/server/apache2/ports.conf

sed -i '1s/.*/	<VirtualHost *:'"${SERVER_PORT}"'>/' /mnt/server/apache2/sites-enabled/000-default.conf

echo -e "[SETUP] Writing PHP version to file"
echo "${PHP_VERSION}" > "php_version.txt"

echo -e "[SETUP] Installing ionCube loaders"

# Create temporary directory for ionCube download
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.tmp

# Get architecture
ARCH=$(uname -m)
echo -e "[INFO] Detected architecture: $ARCH"

# Download ionCube loaders based on architecture
if [ "$ARCH" = "x86_64" ]; then
    echo -e "[SETUP] Downloading ionCube loader for x86_64"
    wget -O /mnt/server/.tmp/ioncube_loaders.tar.gz https://downloads.ioncube.com/loader_downloads/ioncube_loaders_lin_x86-64.tar.gz
elif [ "$ARCH" = "aarch64" ]; then
    echo -e "[SETUP] Downloading ionCube loader for aarch64"
    wget -O /mnt/server/.tmp/ioncube_loaders.tar.gz https://downloads.ioncube.com/loader_downloads/ioncube_loaders_lin_aarch64.tar.gz
else
    echo "Unsupported architecture: $ARCH"
    exit 1
fi

# Extract ionCube loaders
echo -e "[SETUP] Extracting ionCube loader"
tar -zxvf /mnt/server/.tmp/ioncube_loaders.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/.tmp/ > /dev/null 2>&1

# Remove loaders that don't match PHP version
echo -e "[SETUP] Removing non-matching ionCube loaders"
find /mnt/server/.tmp/ioncube -type f ! -name "ioncube_loader_lin_${PHP_VERSION}*.so" -exec rm -f {} \;

# Copy matching ionCube loader to /mnt/server/php/
echo -e "[SETUP] Copying ionCube loader for PHP $PHP_VERSION"
cp /mnt/server/.tmp/ioncube/ioncube_loader_lin_${PHP_VERSION}*.so /mnt/server/php/

# Add the ionCube loader to php.ini
echo -e "[SETUP] Adding ionCube loader to php.ini"
echo "zend_extension=/home/container/php/ioncube_loader_lin_${PHP_VERSION}.so" >> /mnt/server/php/php.ini

# Clean up temporary files
echo -e "[SETUP] Cleaning up temporary files"
rm -rf /mnt/server/.tmp

echo -e "[SETUP] ionCube loader installed for PHP $PHP_VERSION"

echo -e "[SETUP] Configuring Apache to handle PHP requests"
echo "<FilesMatch \\.php$>
    SetHandler \"proxy:unix:/home/container/tmp/php-fpm.sock|fcgi://${SERVER_IP}:${SERVER_PORT}\"
</FilesMatch>" >> /mnt/server/apache2/apache2.conf

if [ "${WORDPRESS}" == "true" ] || [ "${WORDPRESS}" == "1" ]; then
    echo -e "[SETUP] Installing WordPress"
    cd /mnt/server/www
    wget -q http://wordpress.org/latest.tar.gz
    tar xzf latest.tar.gz >/dev/null 2>&1
    mv wordpress/* .
    rm -rf wordpress latest.tar.gz
    echo "[SETUP] WordPress installed at http://${CLOUDFLARE_TUNNEL_DOMAIN}/wp-admin"
else
    echo "<?php phpinfo(); ?>" > "/mnt/server/www/index.php"
    echo "[SETUP] PHP info page created"
fi

echo -e "[DONE] Everything has been installed"
